attributes.action: Put Portugal back on the green list, let us decide where/when we go on holiday.
attributes.additional_details:
It is not fair for people with families abroad. For people who have worked hard during this pandemic to not be able to go on holiday. People who have bought covid testes to obey the rules and restrictions.

It is not fair that there’s a pilot scheme, whilst the working class suffers. Enough is enough. 

We have vaccines available now. We have PCR tests. We have lateral flow tests. What’s the point in the vaccines and testing if we can’t move on and go back to normality?
attributes.background: Portugal should’ve never been removed from the green list. The WHO is not aware of any new variant being detected in Nepal. Portugal was a green country when it was convenient for the UK (Champions League). We have tests and vaccines available - we should not be in a worse position than last year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587911
